landing.title: Know their story before the chapter closes
landing.subtitle: Capture your parents' life stories through meaningful questions before it's too late.
landing.freeToStart: Free to start. No credit card required.

step1.title: Add a Parent
step1.description: Create a profile for your mom, dad, or any loved one whose story you want to capture.

step2.title: Ask Questions
step2.description: Choose from 100 thoughtfully crafted questions about their childhood, career, love, and life lessons.

step3.title: Save Their Story
step3.description: Record their answers and preserve their memories for generations to come.

sampleQuestions.title: Sample Questions
sampleQuestions.subtitle: Thoughtful questions designed to unlock memories and stories you've never heard.
sampleQuestions.q1: What is your earliest childhood memory?
sampleQuestions.q3: What was your first job and what did you learn from it?
sampleQuestions.q4: What's the best advice your parents gave you?
sampleQuestions.q5: What moment in your life are you most proud of?
sampleQuestions.q6: What do you wish you had done differently?
sampleQuestions.andMore: ...and 94 more questions covering childhood, family, career, love, and life wisdom.

q1.question: Is my data private and secure?
q1.answer: Yes, absolutely. Your stories are private and only accessible to you. We use industry-standard encryption and never share your data with third parties.

q2.question: Can I add multiple parents or family members?
q2.answer: Yes! You can add unlimited parents or loved ones, even on the free plan. Each person gets their own set of questions and answers.

q3.question: What happens if I don't finish all the questions?
q3.answer: No pressure! Your answers are auto-saved as you go. Come back anytime to continue where you left off.

q4.question: Can I export or print the stories?
q4.answer: Yes, you can view and print a beautiful summary of all answered questions for each parent.

q5.question: What if I want to ask my own questions?
q5.answer: Premium users can add their own custom questions. It's a great way to ask something specific to your family's history.

finalCta.title: Don't wait until it's too late
finalCta.subtitle: Every day is a chance to learn something new about the people who shaped your life.
